{"id":914768805,"question_id":2657,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1678766073,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/914768805/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Time to Complete All Tasks","memory":"43.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMinimumTime(int[][] tasks) {\n        if (tasks == null || tasks.length == 0) return 0;\n        Arrays.sort(tasks, (a,b) -> (a[1] - b[1])); // sort by end time increasing to complete early task first\n        boolean[] slots = new boolean[2001];\n        for (int[] task : tasks) {\n            int s = task[0];\n            int e = task[1];\n            int dur = task[2];\n            int i = s;\n            for (; i <= e && dur > 0; i++) {\n                if (slots[i]) {\n                    dur--;\n                }\n            }\n            i = e;\n            while (dur > 0 && i >= s) {\n                if (!slots[i]) {\n                    slots[i] = true;\n                    dur--;\n                }\n                i--;\n            }\n        }\n        int res = 0;\n        for (boolean slot : slots) {\n            if (slot) res++;\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-time-to-complete-all-tasks","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
